author: mrglavas
msg: Correcting the default implementations of newDurationYearMonth() and newDurationDayTime()
so that they behave according to the JAXP specification. They must reject lexical values
which are not valid instances of xs:yearMonthDuration and xs:dayTimeDuration.

author: mrglavas
msg: Correcting the default implementations of newDurationYearMonth() and newDurationDayTime()

author: amilas
msg: changed the artifact name to persistence so that any persistence storage can use this module
